name: Skyhawk (Bug-Byte Software)
overview: Not to be confused with the chop-lifter style game of the same name by Pace. This game was written by Steve Lee for the Commodore VIC-20 and was converted to the BBC Micro by Margaret Stanger. It was also published as part of Bug-Byte's Compilation 1 disk. It's a simple take-off, shoot things and land to refuel game.
